short_summary: Request For Proposal for the acquisition one mobile radiology device
description: This bid solicitation cancels and supersedes previous bid solicitation number 21301-221380 dated March 29, 2022 with a closing date of May 24, 2022 at 2:00  . A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidderswho bid on the previous solicitation. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on December 8, 2022. All bids submitted after 2 PM EST will result in the bid being declared nonresponsive. PWGSC, on behalf of Correctional Service of  Canada, is issuing this request for proposal for the acquisition one mobile  across Canada, as detailed in the solicitation.
full_summary:
## Mobile Radiology Device Acquisition
### Request for Proposal RFP
#### Solicitation Information

* **Solicitation Reference Number**: WS3419130824
* **Publication Date**: October 31, 2022
* **Tender Closing Date**: December 8, 2022 (14:00:00 HNE)
* **Amendment Number**: 3
* **Solicitation Type**: Competitive - Open Bidding

#### Description of the Acquisition

The Correctional Service of Canada (CSC) is soliciting proposals for the acquisition of one (1) mobile radiology device, including delivery, installation, and training, to be located in Sainte-Anne-des-Plaines, Quebec, Canada. This solicitation cancels and supersedes previous solicitation number 21301-221380, issued on March 29, 2022, with a closing date of May 24, 2022.

#### Proposal Evaluation Criteria

* Proposals will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.
* A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders and offerors who submitted proposals on the previous solicitation.

#### Solicitation Documents

These solicitation documents and any future amendments may be accessed via the notice URL:

http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14507811?extsite=MTQ1MDc4MTFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

 Registration with BUYANDSELLGOV.CA is required to access the solicitation documents.

#### Contact Information

Andy Doucette (SPAC/PSPC)
andy.doucette@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
Manufacturer: *Low energy medical x-ray equipment and medical radiological positioning aids

#### Trade Agreements

This solicitation is subject to the following trade agreements:

* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Human Rights and Diversity

The Correctional Service of Canada is committed to promoting diversity and inclusion in its procurement activities. The procurement of this acquisition is subject to any legal and regulatory requirements related to human rights and diversity.

#### Award Notice

The award notice will be published on the government's electronic tendering system. Respondent products and services are located in Canada due
